metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4680 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: FreeRADIUS 2.2.x before 2.2.8 and 3.0.x before 3.0.9 does not properly check revocation of intermediate CA certificates.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Upstream states that the recommended configuration is not affected. Only configurations using certs from a public CA are affected and upstream says that such configurations are not recommended. mdeslaur> we will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. Users are advised to follow upstream recommendations or to update to a later Ubuntu release.

criterions.comment: freeradius: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
